channel.title: Change Sheriff results
channel.description:
I was playing sheriff for the first time and when I got my first result, the text was a little hard to read but I saw purple text saying "Black Rose" so I assumed they were a member of the Black Rose. Later, I realized I have been reading it wrong and it said my target **was not** a member of the Black Rose. This needs to be changed.
My suggestion is if your target is a member, just keep it that way. If they are not a member, the result should be "_______ is not a member of the Black Rose" without the purple text.
